metadata.title: CVE-2023-1611 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in btrfs_search_slot in fs/btrfs/ctree.c inbtrfs in the Linux Kernel.This flaw allows an attacker to crash the systemand possibly cause a kernel information lea

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-79-generic - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-5.15.0-79-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-79-generic - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-79-generic-64k - 5.15.0-79.86
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1039-kvm - 5.15.0-1039.44
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1042-aws - 5.15.0-1042.47
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-79-lowlatency - 5.15.0-79.88

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-79.86').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2, was needed').
linux-kvm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1039.44').
linux-aws package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1042.47').
linux-azure package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1045.52').
linux-azure-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-azure-6.2, was needed').
linux-azure-fde package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1045.52.1').
linux-gcp package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1039.47').

linux-gkeop package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1025.30').
linux-ibm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1035.38').
linux-intel-iotg package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1037.42').
linux-lowlatency package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-79.88').
linux-lowlatency-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-lowlatency-hwe-6.2, was needed').
linux-oracle package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1040.46').
linux-oem-5.17: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-oem-6.1, was needed').
linux-oem-6.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.0-1021.21').
linux-oem-6.1 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-1012.12').
linux-raspi package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1035.38').
linux-azure-fde-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-azure-fde-6.2, was needed').
linux-xilinx-zynqmp package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1025.29').
linux-nvidia package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1030.30').
linux-aws-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-aws-6.2, was needed').
linux-gcp-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-gcp-6.2, was needed').
linux-allwinner-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending').
linux-starfive-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending').
linux-starfive-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-starfive-6.5, was pending').
linux-lowlatency-hwe-6.5 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-starfive-6.5 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws-6.5 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure-6.5 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp-6.5 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle-6.5 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
